title: Clear Scalp and Hair Intense Hydration Nourishing Conditioner, 12.7 Ounce
description: Resilient, beautiful hair starts with the right foundation. Clear scalp and hair has a dual-action formulation: a white stripe of deep hydrating treatment, and an aqua stripe infused with cactus extract. It deeply hydrates the scalp and leaves hair resilient and beautiful.

title: Revlon Nutrifusion Conditioning Curling Iron, 3/4 inch
description: Revlon is proud to introduce revlon nutrifusion, a line of hair tools that helps reduce damage and leaves the hair shiny and healthy looking by using some of natures purest oils (moringa, macadamia and argan) valued for their nutritive properties. Curling iron comes with 30 heat settings, on/off switch, and tangle free swivel cord
